title: Choose Your Plan
subtitle: Start free and upgrade as you grow. No hidden fees.

whatAreCredits.question: What are credits?
whatAreCredits.answer: Credits are used to generate images. Each image generation consumes credits based on the model and settings used. Higher quality models and larger images require more credits.

changePlan.question: Can I change my plan anytime?
changePlan.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any payments.

rollOver.question: Do unused credits roll over?
rollOver.answer: Credits reset each month and don't roll over. However, you can purchase additional credit packs that never expire.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Yes! Every new user gets 100 free credits to try our service. No credit card required.
